repairedDockerfile:
FROM php:5.6-cli 

MAINTAINER Centric Web Estate <docker@cwe.space> 

RUN apt-get update && \
 DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y zlib1g-dev git && \
rm -r /var/lib/apt/lists/*

RUN curl -f -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | \
php -- --install-dir=/usr/local/bin --filename=composer && \
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer

ENV COMPOSER_HOME "/root/.composer" 
RUN php --version && \  
composer --version 

CMD ["-"] 
ENTRYPOINT ["composer", "--ansi"]
